job.title: Senior Fullstack Engineer - .Net/C# and Angular
job.description:
We're looking for a highly skilled senior full-stack engineer (.NET/C# and Angular - bonus: Python) to join our small but mighty team. You will be responsible for developing our employer-facing web app and work alongside our existing engineering team and our founders.

**Responsibilities**

- Develop and maintain our web application and APIs, ensuring high performance and responsiveness
- Manage and optimise container orchestration with Kubernetes (K8s) to streamline deployment and scaling of our applications
- Create user-friendly, efficient, and visually appealing front-end interfaces
- Implement best practices for code quality, security, and scalability
- Continuously monitor and improve application performance and usability
- Help foster a culture of technical excellence and collaborate with the team to improve software design

# **Requirements**

- Strong background in full-stack development, ideally in a startup
- Deep customer empathy and passion for solving gnarly problems with tech
- Strong proficiency in .NET/C# and Angular (bonus: Python)
- Expertise in AWS cloud services (EKS, S3, CloudWatch) and familiarity with cloud architecture best practices
- Solid understanding and practical experience with Kubernetes for container orchestration
- Excellent problem-solving abilities and a detail-oriented mindset
- Strong English communication skills and ability to work collaboratively in a team environment
- ***Bonus:*** Experience with LLMs (OpenAI, Claude) and vector databases

customFields.generatedDescriptionAIv2:
We are seeking a Senior Fullstack Engineer with significant startup experience to join our team. The ideal candidate should have strong expertise in .Net/C# and Angular. As a Senior Fullstack Engineer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining our web applications, ensuring they are robust, performant, and scalable. You should have a deep understanding of software development principles and be able to work independently or collaboratively in an Agile environment. If you have a proven track record of delivering high-quality code on time and are passionate about building innovative products, we want to hear from you!

Relevant skills:
- .Net
- C#
- Angular
- Startup experience
